mapper.sql: ADMIN_ID as adminId, name as name, ROLE_ID as roleId, mail as mail, PORTRAIT as portrait
mapper.select:
SELECT tua.ADMIN_ID as adminId,tua.name as name,tr.ROLE_NAME as roleName,tr.ROLE_ID as roleId,mail as mail,DELETE_FLAG as deleteFlag,PORTRAIT as portrait FROM t_user_admin tua inner join t_role tr on tr.ROLE_ID = tua.ROLE_ID
tr.ROLE_ID !='0'
and tua.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%' )
and tua.mail like CONCAT('%',#{mail},'%' )
and tua.DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag}
and tr.ROLE_ID =#{roleId}
ORDER BY tua.modify_user DESC ,tua.ADMIN_ID

SELECT tua.ADMIN_ID as adminId,tua.name as name,tr.ROLE_NAME as roleName,tr.ROLE_ID as roleId,mail as mail,DELETE_FLAG as deleteFlag,PORTRAIT as portrait, tua.CREATE_USER as createUser,tua.CREATE_DATE as createDate, tua.MODIFY_USER as modifyUser,tua.MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate FROM t_user_admin tua inner join t_role tr on tr.ROLE_ID = tua.ROLE_ID where tua.ADMIN_ID=#{adminId}
